name: Daily Insight Email from Structured Web Data with Firecrawl

user.name: Automate With Marc
user.bio:
Automating Start-Up and Business processes. 
Helping non-techies understand and leverage Agentic AI with easy to understand step-by-step tutorials.
Check out my educational content:
https://www.youtube.com/@Automatewithmarc

description:
üî• Daily Web Scraper & AI Summary with Firecrawl + Email Automation
Need to extract and summarize web content from a site that doesn‚Äôt have an API? This workflow runs daily to scrape a web page using Firecrawl, summarize the content with OpenAI, and send it directly to your email ‚Äî fully automated.

Watch Full Video Step-by-step Tutorial Here:
https://www.youtube.com/@Automatewithmarc

üîß How It Works
Daily Trigger ‚Äì Starts the workflow every 24 hours.

Firecrawl Node ‚Äì Crawls and extracts structured data from any web page you specify.

OpenAI Node (Optional) ‚Äì Processes and summarizes the raw content using a prompt you control.

Gmail Node ‚Äì Sends the final summary or content snapshot to your email inbox.

‚úÖ Perfect For
Business analysts tracking daily market or industry news

Researchers and founders automating competitive intelligence

Anyone who wants web data delivered without coding or scraping scripts

ü™ú Setup Instructions
Firecrawl API Key ‚Äì Sign up and insert your key in the credentials.

Update Target URL ‚Äì Edit the URL in the Firecrawl node to your desired site.

Customize the Prompt ‚Äì Tailor the OpenAI prompt to extract the insights you want.

Connect Gmail ‚Äì Add your Gmail credentials and set your recipient email.

üß∞ Built With
Firecrawl (Web scraping without code)

OpenAI (For summarizing and insight extraction)

Gmail (Automated notifications)

n8n (Workflow automation engine)

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
